summary: Adds a spell tome with only 6 words in the book: The key to immortality... is death.
descriptionHtml:
!WARNING!
Save your game before using this! Once using the spell it only wears off with a load game or mod uninstall.

DESCRIPTION~
Adds a brand new spell to the game that gives you ghost visuals.
Comes with a little back story on a note located on top of the book.
Spell Tome can be found in Farengar Secret-Fire\'s bedroom in Dragonsreach.
For the longest time I have wanted to look like a ghost. Sure there is that philter in the quest that gives you the appearance for 30 seconds, but I wanted to have a ghastly appearance and roleplay as the first Dragonborn reborn into Skyrim.

Version 1.0~Mod Base
Version 1.2~ Fixed issue to were collision was turned off.

Credits-
Bethesda for Skyrim and Creation Kit
author: boxrocks
